forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 11C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 52F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High near 55F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
